string.name: Name
string.description: Name to display for this DCC programming track.

string.name: User Description
string.description: You can write additional notes about this programming track here.

segment.name: DCC Programming Track
segment.description: Configures a single DCC programming track

int.name: Delete From Roster?
int.description: Selecting 'Delete' will remove all settings of this programming track from the roster. WARNING: this operation cannot be undone.
